column6: VIPP Intersis is a French customer experience specialist. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Paris, France.
column36: The company notes the following benefits in Cotonou: a French-speaking population; young and with a high level of higher education thanks in particular to the proximity of the University of Abomey Calavi; economic dynamism and an appetite for service professions that are still underdeveloped; a lack of time difference between its customers and their production teams.

column6: Founded in January 2013, Togo-based Africa Global Recycling offers innovative solutions for businesses and entities to enable them to be environmentally conscious without incurring additional costs.

Ukrainian Flour Company engages in the manufacture and distribution of flour, feed and grain. It exports its products to China, Moldova, Israel, Palestine, the Philippines, Angola, Georgia, the United Arab Emirates, Malaysia, and other countries. The company was established in 2017 and is based in Cherkasy, Ukraine.

Olnica provides security solutions for materials protection applications. The company offers taggants that allow users to identify and authenticate products; multi-level marks; anti-theft solutions; and OT-1 reader, a portable reader. It serves stationery, plastics manufacturing, aeronautics, textile, and packaging sectors. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Chantepie, France.
